name: nodered-typescript-node-lower-case-example
description: Mimics the lower-case example from the Node-RED docs, but using TypeScript.
author: Bernardo Belchior

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run copy-static-assets
scripts.watch: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -p "[{name}]" -n "Assets,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run copy-static-assets" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
